alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northwest Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 3:58PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect northeastern Aroostook County... At 357 PM EST...An area of heavy snow showers was along a line extending from near Van Buren to Allagash...and moving southeast AT 30 MPH. Locations impacted include... Fort Kent, Madawaska, Van Buren, Eagle Lake, Allagash, Deboullie Mountain, Frenchville, New Canada, Lille, Cross Lake, Madawaska Lake, Dickey, Allagash Township, New Sweden, Wallagrass, Grand Isle, Connor, Caswell, Stockholm and Winterville. This includes the following highways... US Highway 1 between Van Buren and Grand Isle. State Highway 11 between Winterville and Wallagrass. * Winds in excess of 25 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow showers. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter mile in this area of heavy snow showers. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
